title: Looking for modern face, please help
content:
Hello All,

I was hoping that someone can help me out as I am in need of a modern clean looking typeface.

I am looking for something that resembles : Telenor ( [http://www.telenor.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20091213031800/http:/www.telenor.com/ "http://www.telenor.com/"))

The clien lines , stable and works great in an identity as well as body copy.

Could anyone please recomment something please.

Thank you in advance for all the help.

Cheers

Lukas
author: Lukas.D

comments.content: How about Meta? Also has a book variant.

Neo Sans (Iâ€™ve used it on a few projects and it worked very well):
